name: INDICAM
goal: Indicam is the biggest italian association for the defense of IPRs and to help companies fight against counterfeiting. Main goals of the organization are representing them in advocacy activitities, managing their relations with public and enforcement authorities, cooperating with public institutions for the spreding of the culture of IPRs
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives: INDICAM is monitoring activities running in the EU. The association is managing relations with MEPs, as well as all dossier related to the illicit trade, the IPRs, the tracking&traceability, the customs regulation, the e-commerce and the copyright
